title: Introduction to C Programming
desc: C programming is a foundational programming language known for its efficiency and versatility. It's widely used for system-level programming, software development, and embedded systems.

title: Introduction to Algorithms
desc: 'Introduction to Algorithms' is a renowned textbook by Cormen, Leiserson, Rivest, and Stein. It covers fundamental principles of designing and analyzing algorithms, offering essential etc.

title: Introduction to C++ for DSA
desc: 'Introduction to C++ for DSA' introduces C++ programming language concepts, emphasizing data structures and algorithms (DSA). It's essential for aspiring software engineers

title: Basic Data Structures
desc: Basic data structures are foundational components of computer programming, including arrays, linked lists, stacks, and queues. They organize and store data, enabling efficient manipulation, retrieval.

title: Introduction to OOP Python
desc: 'Introduction to OOP Python' covers Object-Oriented Programming (OOP) principles in Python. It teaches encapsulation, inheritance, and polymorphism, enabling developers to create modular.

title: Software Engineering
desc: Software engineering is the systematic discipline of designing, developing, testing, and maintaining software systems. It employs engineering principles and practices to ensure efficient, reliable.

title: AWS, Cloud Computing
desc: AWS (Amazon Web Services) is a leading cloud computing platform that offers a wide range of scalable and on-demand cloud services. Cloud computing enables the provision of computing resources.

title: Database (MySQL)
desc: MySQL is an open-source relational database management system. It stores and manages structured data, making it widely used in web applications. MySQL offers robust features.

title: Problem-Solving Part
desc: Problem-solving involves identifying, analyzing, and solving complex issues or challenges. It often follows a structured approach, such as defining the problem, generating solutions, evaluating options.
